dcterms:description: LeCaRD is a well-annotated Chinese legal case retrieval benchmark that composes 107 queries and 10,700 candidate cases selected from a corpus of over 43,000 Chinese criminal judgments. It covers queries across diverse difficulties and categories, with the top 30 relevant candidate cases of each query annotated in four-level relevance scales.
dcterms:title: LeCaRD

dcterms:description: COLIEE is a dataset used for evaluating the competition on legal information extraction and entailment, focusing on legal case retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: COLIEE

dcterms:description: CAIL2019-SCM is a dataset designed for similar case matching in the legal domain, providing a benchmark for evaluating models in this specific task.
dcterms:title: CAIL2019-SCM
